summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Headband Wigs for Black Women, Headband Wig Ombre, Synthetic Glueless Wigs with Headbands Attached Kinky Straight Headband Wig for Daily Use (20inch, kinky straight 1B/30#) Review Date: 2021/08/06 Store: Tioolioo Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Silk', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Tioolioo', 'Cartoon Character': 'American', 'Package Dimensions': '9.65 x 8.78 x 2.2 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'UPC': '783919191440'} Review Text: I can’t say this feels like real hair but it looks great. Make sure to wash and deep condition or it feels like straw. I used “repair” conditioner on this synthetic and air dried. Put a little argon oil and boom… it stays nice for my 16 hour shifts. Review Title: Simple wig but nice Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Headband Wig Body Wave Headband Wigs for Black Women Synthetic Long Wavy Headband Wig Glueless Half Wig Mixed Brown 26 Inch 180% Density Wigs with Headbands Attached for Daily Use(26 Inch ombre brown) Review Date: 2021/08/06 Store: Alicoco Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Alicoco', 'Package Dimensions': '12.4 x 6.22 x 2.87 inches; 12.63 Ounces'} Review Text: It’s cute but tangles extremely easily. Like, a head turn and you’ve got tangles. Keep a wide tooth comb on you. It looks like it does in the pictures but even with conditioning spray, it’s still a little stiff. Review Title: Cute Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ANNELBEL Glueless Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Body Wave Wig 4x4 Lace Closure Wig Remy Human Hair Wig 150% Density Human Hair Wigs for Black Women Natural Color (20inch, Body Wave Wigs) Review Date: 2021/08/14 Store: ANNELBEL Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '20 x 7 x 1 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Product Dimensions': '20 x 7 x 1 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '601968654399'} Review Text: The hair is super soft (like Caucasian hair) which isn’t bad. The wig itself was nice. But it had lice( all throughout the strands), and the nits were sewn into the wefts. absolutely disappointing. Amazon was able to refund me and I had to throw out my comb and brush. I will not be reordering from this seller. Please check your hair before you ever put it in your head. :( Review Title: Please be careful Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Headband Wigs Human Hair Straight Headband Wigs for Black Women Natural Black Color 180% Density 18 Inches Review Date: 2021/08/20 Store: Laivay Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '20 x 3 x 2 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Laivay', 'Product Dimensions': '20 x 3 x 2 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HDSO01'} Review Text: The packaging is amazing. It came with one cute headband and one that’s more for edge control but it was free so that’s always a plus. The wig is great, but 150% you can tell from how thin it is as well as it being plainly labeled right on the box. I bought the 180%. It is very nice though so I’m going to add a bundle and call it a day.
Update: I added a bundle. Holds curls like a champ. Perfect straight or curly Review Title: Not what I bought, but still beautiful Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual's shopping behavior reveals a consistent preference for wigs, particularly headband styles, with an emphasis on synthetic and human hair materials. Ratings indicate a mixed sentiment toward product quality; while ratings like 4.0 suggest satisfaction with appearance and functionality, lower ratings highlight issues, particularly with tangling and quality control.

Common themes suggest the wigs are intended for daily use, focusing on aesthetic appeal rather than natural texture. The user expresses a specific interest in modern styles, catering to fashion rather than traditional authenticity. Notably, a recurring issue with one product indicated potential health concerns, affecting sentiment negatively.

Quality preferences lean toward softness and ease of styling, notably with added conditioning. However, a notable price sensitivity is observed, as some comments reflect an adjustment strategy (e.g., adding hair bundles to enhance thickness). Despite being willing to spend on quality, dissatisfaction arises when expectations are not met, particularly regarding product integrity.

In summary, the core preferences indicate a strong interest in practical yet stylish wigs, with a balanced approach to quality and price. However, the experience with specific sellers emphasizes a need for thorough quality assurance, impacting future purchasing decisions.

target_interaction.title: So pretty
target_interaction.text: The hair was true to length. I bought 24” and it’s draping down my back. The curls dropped after a good brush and did not come back after wash but it takes heat well. It doesn’t seem to be 180 density but it is still very nice. Mine was preplucked and ready to go. The cap is a little large for my head but I made do. I would order again
target_interaction.title_meta: Body Wave Lace Front Wigs Human Hair 180% Density Human Hair Wigs, 4X4 Lace Closure Wigs for Black Women Brazilian Body Wave Wigs with Pre Plucked Natural Hairline Black Color 24 Inch
